section.p: A trick of the light throws red shadows against the western clouds. Squinting into the blaze of dying sunlight, you imagine a scene of battle. An owl flies above phalanxes of troops, guiding them to victory against demons with round shields who seem to emerge out of a great blood-washed lake.
Startled out of your reverie, the spell is broken. Now you see only a line of pink clouds under the gathering curtain of night.
